data.event: The first permanent post office in the area was established in 1840 by William Rose who named it the Roseville Post Office in honor of his father Dennison Rose, a veteran of the War of 1812.

event.title: named it the Roseville Post Office in honor of his father Dennison Rose, a veteran of the War of 1812

data.event: The first permanent post office in the area was established in 1840 by William Rose who named it the Roseville Post Office in honor of his father Dennison Rose, a veteran of the War of 1812.
The Village of Roseville was incorporated in 1926 and the Municipal Building was constructed in 1929 at Gratiot Avenue and Meier Road.
The Village of Roseville was incorporated in 1926 and the Municipal Building was constructed in 1929 at Gratiot Avenue and Meier Road.

event.title: was built near the corner of 11 Mile Road and Gratiot in 1886

data.event: This replaced the Erin Township Building that was built near the corner of 11 Mile Road and Gratiot in 1886.
The 1929 building housed administrative offices as well as the police and fire departments until the 1960s when separate police and fire stations were constructed.

event.title: the 1960s when separate police and fire stations were constructed

data.event: The 1929 building housed administrative offices as well as the police and fire departments until the 1960s when separate police and fire stations were constructed.
City offices remained in the building until 1974.

event.title: opened at Gratiot Avenue and Frazho Road in 1919

data.event: Michiganâ€™s first commercial airport, Packard Field, opened at Gratiot Avenue and Frazho Road in 1919.
It was renamed Gratiot Airport in 1929 and later Hartung Field.

event.title: was constructed on the site in the 1950s

data.event: The Eastgate Shopping Center was constructed on the site in the 1950s.
